title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.63 - Equalization fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.63 - Equalization fund

State Regulations

The commissioner shall designate a fiscal agent who shall
establish and maintain a separate fund known as the "equalization fund" into
which he shall deposit all payments made by marketers pursuant to sections
21.64 and
21.66
of this Part, and out of
which, at the direction of a person duly authorized by the commissioner, such
fiscal agent shall make all payments pursuant to sections
21.62, 21.65, 21.66 and
21.67
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
21.63

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
